purpose: The email announces the call for papers for the 2nd International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins (EDTconf 2025), which will take place on October 6–7, 2025, in Michigan, US. The conference aims to gather researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to discuss the systematic and scalable engineering of Digital Twins (DTs) across various domains. It outlines important dates for abstract and paper submissions, as well as topics of interest for potential submissions. Additionally, it provides submission guidelines and mentions an opportunity for selected best papers to be invited for extended publication in a journal.

infos:
Subject: CfP - 2nd International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Mon, 16 Jun 2025 05:31:20 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
We are excited to share the call for papers, to the International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins.
2nd International Conference on Engineering Digital Twins
Co-located with MODELS 2025 | October 6–7, 2025, Michigan, US
EDTconf 2025 aims to bring together researchers and practitioners
